name: redux-arc
description: Abstraction layer to simplify rest api calls in redux

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && yarn test && yarn run build
scripts.docs:build: yarn run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g viniciusdacal/redux-arc && cp logo/apple-touch-icon.png _book/gitbook/images/apple-touch-icon-precomposed-152.png && cp logo/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images
scripts.docs:publish: yarn run docs:clean && yarn run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:viniciusdacal/redux-arc gh-pages --force
